# cc-tools

Claude Code Tools - MCP servers for development tools.

## Version: 1.7.0

This library provides MCP servers for:
- Build testing and verification
- Development server management
- Fast linting (OXC for JS/TS, Ruff for Python)
- Icon management (Heroicons)
- Image generation (DALL-E, Unsplash)
- Route testing
- Browser automation
- Package management
- Integration analysis
- ShadCN UI components

## Installation

```bash
pip install cc-tools
```

## Available MCP Servers

- `mcp-build-test` - Build and test verification
- `mcp-dev-server` - Development server management
- `mcp-oxc` - Ultra-fast JavaScript/TypeScript linting
- `mcp-ruff` - Ultra-fast Python linting
- `mcp-heroicons` - Heroicon management
- `mcp-dalle` - DALL-E image generation
- `mcp-unsplash` - Unsplash image fetching
- `mcp-route-testing` - API route testing
- `mcp-browser` - Browser automation
- `mcp-integration-analyzer` - Template integration analysis
- `mcp-package-manager` - Secure package management
- `mcp-shadcn` - ShadCN UI component management
- `mcp-cwd-reporter` - Working directory reporting

See VERSION_MAPPING.md for version compatibility with app-factory branches.
